caption: Equipped with Audio and MIDI system
It can be set up with display, keyboard and mouse, or via  Wi-Fi with an iPad
Live Control allows remote control on the stage
On the stage it can         be also controlled         via Wi-Fi with an iPad
You can also play with iPad/iPhone ,        via MIDI over         Wi-Fi         Network
Foot Controller accessory to connect up to 4 footswitches
Includes: Live Control remote control with 5m cable,        2U rack mounting
Running the AudioStation VST host    /    Running a DAW software
Powered with Jack Audio         Connection Kit to run         multiple applications
